item.title: Using the Report Builder
item.description: DefectDojo allows you to create Custom Reports for external audiences, which summarize the Findings or Endpoints that you wish to report on. Custom Reports can include branding and boilerplate text, and can also be used as Templates for future reports.

item.title: Templates and Historical Reports
item.description:
Once you have created one or more Reports in DefectDojo you can take further actions, including:

  • Using a report as a template for subsequent reports
